summary: This mod adds 12 shrines all around Skyrim and can give you a power
descriptionHtml:
[center]Welcome to

[img]http://s10.postimage.org/u1od68r15/copertina.jpg[/img][/center]

* OVERVIEW *

This mod adds 12 shrines all around Skyrim:

    Morning Star Shrine
    Sun\'s Dawn Shrine
    First Seed Shrine
    Rain\'s Hand Shrine
    Second Seed Shrine
    Mid Year Shrine
    Sun\'s Height Shrine
    Last Seed Shrine
    Heartfire Shrine
    Frostfall Shrine
    Sun\'s Dusk Shrine
    Evening Star Shrine
	
When you discover a new shrine, a marker is added in your map. If you activate all 12 shrines you\'ll get the Calendar\'s Shrines Power:

- 25% frost resistant
- 25% fire resistant
- 25% shock resistant
- 25% poison resistant

The effect expires in 12 hours (realtime). After that you have to reactivate all the shrines if you want again the power

Enjoy and explore Skyrim :)

* NOTE FOR WHO ALREADY HAVE THE PREVIOUS VERSION *

If you have already find the shrines, you have just to come back and reactivate them. Don\'t care about beams.
author: MannyGT

files.name: The Calendars Shrines
files.changelogHtml: More balanced power with time expiration
